import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{io}from'socket.io-client';import axios from'axios';import SystemMetrics from'./SystemMetrics';import QueueSummary from'./QueueSummary';import JobList from'./JobList';import FailedJobsPanel from'./FailedJobsPanel';import WorkerMonitor from'./WorkerMonitor';import TimeSeriesCharts from'./TimeSeriesCharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE='http://localhost:3000/api';const SOCKET_URL='http://localhost:3000';function App(){const[metrics,setMetrics]=useState({});const[queues,setQueues]=useState([]);const[selectedQueue,setSelectedQueue]=useState(null);const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);const[failedJobs,setFailedJobs]=useState([]);const[workers,setWorkers]=useState([]);const[timeseries,setTimeseries]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{// Initial fetch
axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/metrics")).then(r=>setMetrics(r.data));axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/queues")).then(r=>setQueues(r.data));axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/failed-jobs")).then(r=>setFailedJobs(r.data));axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/workers")).then(r=>setWorkers(r.data));axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/metrics/timeseries")).then(r=>setTimeseries(r.data));},[]);useEffect(()=>{const socket=io(SOCKET_URL);socket.on('metrics',setMetrics);socket.on('queues',setQueues);socket.on('failedJobs',setFailedJobs);socket.on('workers',setWorkers);socket.on('timeseries',setTimeseries);return()=>socket.disconnect();},[]);const handleQueueClick=queueName=>{setSelectedQueue(queueName);axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/queues/").concat(queueName,"/jobs")).then(r=>setJobs(r.data));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontFamily:'sans-serif',background:'#f4f6fa',minHeight:'100vh',padding:24},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Job Queue System Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SystemMetrics,{metrics:metrics}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QueueSummary,{queues:queues,onQueueClick:handleQueueClick}),selectedQueue&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(JobList,{jobs:jobs,queue:selectedQueue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FailedJobsPanel,{failedJobs:failedJobs}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkerMonitor,{workers:workers}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimeSeriesCharts,{data:timeseries})]});}export default App;
